DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect neuromuscular electrical stimulation ( NMES ) neuromuscular functional parameter elderly knee osteoarthritis . The hypothesis NAMES able strengthen quadriceps muscle improve healthy status elderly knee osteoarthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation ( NMES ) Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: woman , minimum age 50 year ; clinically diagnose knee OA ; contraindication execute maximal knee extension test ( e.g. , cardiorespiratory complication ) ; previous musculoskeletal joint injury besides knee OA ; hip knee surgery ; neurological problem .
